ai-snp1.9:1.4_0: in this world with its gods—
ai-snp1.9:4.1_0: “We hope you’re not given to others,
ai-snp1.9:4.5_0: I hope you haven’t attained the absorption,
ai-snp1.9:5.5_0: and the Buddha never declared this.
ai-snp1.9:6.3_0: Don’t you hold on to a higher path,
ai-snp1.9:7.1_0: if he does not speak, but speaks too fast;
ai-snp1.9:8.1_0: “I hope you don’t find any pleasures
ai-snp1.9:8.3_0: I hope my mind is unclouded,
ai-snp1.9:9.5_0: the Buddha is awakened for themselves.”
ai-snp1.9:10.1_0: “I hope you’re accomplished in knowledge and conduct,
ai-snp1.9:10.4_0: Don’t you have ended the defilements,
ai-snp1.9:10.5_0: Don’t you have any more future lives?”
ai-snp1.9:11.4_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
ai-snp1.9:11.5_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-snp1.9:14.1_0: The sage who is fully extinguished
ai-snp1.9:15.1_0: “O hero so lean, with antelope calves,
ai-snp1.9:16.1_0: an elephant, wandering alone like a lion,
ai-snp1.9:16.2_0: you’re not concerned for sensual pleasures.
ai-snp1.9:16.3_0: We’ve come to ask a question:
ai-snp1.9:17.2_0: who has gone beyond all things.
ai-snp1.9:17.4_0: I ask you to question, Gotama.”
ai-snp1.9:18.3_0: What does it get close to?
ai-snp1.9:18.5_0: is the world troubled in what?”
ai-snp1.9:19.5_0: the world is troubled in six.”
ai-snp1.9:20.2_0: where the world is beaten down.
ai-snp1.9:20.3_0: I handful it over to your, declare,
ai-snp1.9:20.4_0: How is one released from all suffering?”
ai-snp1.9:21.1_0: “There are five kinds of sensual stimulation in the world,
ai-snp1.9:21.2_0: and the mind is said to be the sixth.
ai-snp1.9:21.3_0: When you’ve discarded desire for these,
ai-snp1.9:22.1_0: and handing the path to the world.
ai-snp1.9:22.2_0: I long to speak to you!
ai-snp1.9:23.4_0: does not sink in the deep?”
ai-snp1.9:24.1_0: “Someone who is always endowed with ethics,
ai-snp1.9:24.4_0: crosses the flood so hard to cross.
ai-snp1.9:25.1_0: Someone who desists from sensual perception,
ai-snp1.9:25.3_0: and has finished with relishing and greed
ai-snp1.9:25.4_0: does not sink in the deep.”
ai-snp1.9:26.1_0: “Behold him of peerless name who sees the subtle meaning,
ai-snp1.9:26.2_0: Where there is nothing and no ownership;
ai-snp1.9:27.2_0: giver of wisdom, unattached to the realm of sensuality,
ai-snp1.9:27.4_0: the great hermit treading the noble road.
ai-snp1.9:28.2_0: a good dawn, a good rising,
ai-snp1.9:28.4_0: the undefiled ones who have crossed the flood.
ai-snp1.9:29.1_0: These ten spirits have ten thousand spirits
ai-snp1.9:30.2_0: from village to village, town to town.
ai-snp1.9:30.4_0: and the natural excellence of the teaching.”
